mapper.insert: insert into vs_user (user_id, user_name, user_no, user_pwd, user_pwd_salt, user_email, user_create_time, user_login_time, user_last_ip) values (#{userId}, #{userName}, #{userNo}, #{userPwd}, #{userPwdSalt}, #{userEmail}, #{userCreateTime}, #{userLoginTime}, #{userLastIP});
mapper.select: select user_id userId, user_name userName, user_pwd userPwd, user_pwd_salt userPwdSalt, user_no userNo, user_email userEmail, user_create_time userCreateTime, user_login_time userLoginTime, user_last_ip userLastIP from vs_user where user_id = #{userId};
select vr.role_id roleId, role_name roleName from vs_role vr join vs_user_role vur on vr.role_id = vur.role_id where user_id = #{userId};
